title: Photo Upload/Edit
custom_preconds:
For this suite you can either add a photo from any ballpark guide page, POI, check-in flow, or event detail page. All of these starting points will take you through the photo upload/edit flow.

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/QAspace/Data+Points+and+Lookups

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on add photo button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see an option to either take photo(Camera) or choose photo(Photo Library)

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user chooses take a photo to upload
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN after the photo is taken the user will see the options 'Retake' or 'Use Photo' at the bottom of the screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user chooses to take a photo to upload
AND the user taps on the 'retake' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought back to the camera to retake the photo

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user chooses to take a photo to upload
AND The user taps on the 'Use Photo' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought to the photo edit page

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user chooses a photo to upload from their gallery
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then they will be taken to the edit photo page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user chooses to upload a photo from their gallery
And the user is brought to the edit photo page
AND the user taps on 'Cancel'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought back to where they entered the upload photo flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the edit photo page
and the user taps on the 'Save' button located on the top right
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the 'Save Photo' page
and there will be an 'Upload' button on the top right
and the photo that was saved will be in the middle of the page
and there will be a caption input box below the photo

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the 'Save Photo' page
and the user taps on the back button located on the top left
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought back to the 'Edit Photo' page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Save Photo page
and the user looks at the caption box below the photo
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see ghost text displaying 'Add a caption'
and typing in that box will make the ghost text disappear
and then deleting your text will make the ghost text reappear

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Save Photo page
and the user types text into the caption box
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the character limit value decrease from 140

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Save Journal page
and the user taps on the 'Upload' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the uploading is in progress page
and there will be a done button on the top right
and there will be a share button under the upload message
and below the share button will be the photo that you have uploaded

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the upload in progress page
and the user taps on the 'done' button on the top left
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is brought back to the place where they had initiated the photo upload

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has chosen a photo from their gallery to upload
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is brought to the edit photo page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Edit Photo page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see a section at the bottom that contains stickers

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Edit Photo page
and the user looks at the stickers section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see an indicator(small white dot) below the sticker that is currently selected

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Edit Photo Page
and the user taps on the different stickers
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the indicator will move to the next sticker as you tap on it

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Edit Photo page
and the user taps on the different stickers
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then that sticker that the user taps on gets applied to photo
*tap on all stickers to make sure they appear

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Edit Photo page
and the user taps on the no sticker button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there will be no sticker applied to the photo

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Edit Photo page
and the user selects a sticker
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the sticker will appear on the photo

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has finished editing the photo
and the user adds a sticker
and the user taps on the 'Save' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the 'Save Photo' page
and the user will see the sticker that was added to the photo

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has added a sticker to a photo
and the user has completed uploading that photo
and the user looks at the photo from Journal photos page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the photo will have the sticker displaying on the photo

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Edit Photo page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to zoom in the photo to crop it

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Edit Photo page
and the user zooms in to crop the photo
and the user taps on the Save button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the save photo page
and the photo will be cropped to the position that the user had set from the edit photo page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the edit photo page
and the user zooms in to crop the photo
and the user saves and uploads the photo
and the user looks at the photo in the journal photos page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the photo will still be in the same cropped position that the user set from the edit photo page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the save photo view
and the user looks at the caption text box located below the photo
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see prepopulatedg ghost text displaying "Add a caption"
and tapping in the box will remove that text
and removing your typed in text will again bring back the ghost text

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is in the photo edit view
and the user does not enter in any text
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not see a caption when viewing the uploaded photo in Journal

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the photo edit view
and the user types in a caption
and then the user uploads the photo
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN when the user looks at the photo in Journal they will see the caption that was typed displayed in the photo underneath the photo
and if there is a matchup then the the caption will appear below the matchup

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user adds a photo either by camera or device gallery
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN when the user views the photo in the edit photo page the photo will be cropped to fit in the square

custom_steps_separated.content: When we edit a photo
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN we will be able to zoom in and crop the photo
and the photo will remain in the cropped state in the final version of the photo

custom_steps_separated.content: When we add a sticker to the photo
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the photo will be zoomed in once a sticker is added

custom_steps_separated.content: When we add a photo from the event detail page on either the ballpark guide page or a past game in Journal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN when looking at that photo we will see the game matchup appear at the bottom of the photo
and that matchup will match the event it was uploaded for

title: Photo Sharing
custom_preconds: The share option is on the last step of the upload process(photo uploading is in progress)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the upload is in progress page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a share button below the progress message

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the 'Share' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the iOS standard social share sheets listed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has typed in a caption on the edit photo page
and the user chooses either Twitter or Facebook to share the photo with
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then when the Twitter or Facebook share sheet appears the user will see the text that they typed in pre-populated

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has completed sharing a photo to Facebook
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN when the user looks at Facebook they will see the photo that they uploaded appear
and the user will see the text that was typed in as the caption

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user has completed sharing a photo to Twitter
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then when the user looks at Twitter then the they will see the photo they uploaded appear
and the user will see the text that was typed in as the caption

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user chooses to share the photo via text message
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the photo appear in the text message screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user chooses to share the photo via email
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the photo copied to the body of the email
